title: PSA: if you run an all AD comp, you are gonna have a huge problem.
body:
Before this update, you could kinda get away with an all AD comp, but now, you will be in a lot of trouble unless you end the game before 25 minutes. The changes to tank items makes it impossible to deal with an armor stacking comp. 

It is sad how bad all AD comps are now. Do yourself a favor and just dodge if your team is all AD. You won't win anyway.

down votes don't make it any less true xd
